Class MainManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs301w01.meatload.controllers.MainManager

    public class MainManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements FController
    Mediates between DBManager and Skindex by providing lists of Albums and Tags.
    Author:
    Isaac Matichuk
    See Also:
    DBManager, Skindex
